languages.text: {n}Эльдарка недовольно кривит губы.{/n} "Провидцы. Они были в силах. Они вели Крударах к процветанию многие годы, но в итоге стали слишком слепы к тому, что происходит вокруг. Если бы они не решили следовать пророчеству, как того требуют старые обычаи, а сменили курс... Крударах мог бы остаться цел".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдарка недовольно кривит губы.{/n} "Провидцы. Они были в силах. Ини вели Крударах к процветанию многие годы, но в итоге стали слишком слепы к тому, что происходит вокруг. Если бы они не решили следовать пророчеству, как того требуют старые обычаи, а спенили курс... Крударах мог бы остаться цел".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in displeasure.{/n} "The Farseers. It was not beyond their power. They led Crudarach to prosperity for years, only to become too blind to what was going on around them. Had they not followed the prophecy as the old customs required, had they changed course instead... Crudarach might still be whole."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарка недовольно кривит губы.{/n} "Провидцы. Они были в силах. Они вели Крударах к процветанию многие годы, но в итоге стали слишком слепы к тому, что происходит вокруг. Если бы они не решили следовать пророчеству, как того требуют старые обычаи, а сменили курс... Крударах мог бы остаться цел".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in displeasure.{/n} "The Farseers. It was not beyond their powers. They had led Crudarach to prosperity for years, only to become too blind to what went on around them. Had they not followed the prophesy as the old customs required, had they changed course instead... Crudarach could have been unharmed."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet tuerce la boca, disgustada.{/n} «Los videntes. En sus manos sí que estaba. Crudarach prosperó durante años bajo su liderazgo, y sin embargo no fueron capaces de ver lo que sucedía a su alrededor. Si no hubieran seguido la profecía según dictaban nuestras viejas costumbres, si en vez de eso hubiesen cambiado de rumbo... tal vez Crudarach aún estaría intacto».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in displeasure.{/n} "The Farseers. It was not beyond their power. They led Crudarach to prosperity for years, only to become too blind to what was going on around them. Had they not followed the prophecy as the old customs required, had they changed course instead... Crudarach might still be whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet tuerce la boca, disgustada.{/n} «Los videntes. En sus manos sí que estaba. Crudarach prosperó durante años bajo su liderazgo, y sin embargo no fueron capaces de ver lo que sucedía a su alrededor. Si no hubieran seguido la profecía según dictaban nuestras viejas costumbres, si en vez de eso hubiesen cambiado de rumbo... tal vez Crudarach aún estaría intacto».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは不愉快そうに口を歪めた。 {/n}「先見司たちだ。彼らの力でどうにかできたはずだった。長くクルダラを繁栄に導いた彼らだったが、おかげで自分たちの周囲で何が起きているのかが見えなくなっていた。もし彼らが古の習わしの通り、予言に従わずにいれば、代わりに航路を変えていれば…クルダラは今も無傷だったかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in displeasure.{/n} "The Farseers. It was not beyond their power. They led Crudarach to prosperity for years, only to become too blind to what was going on around them. Had they not followed the prophecy as the old customs required, had they changed course instead... Crudarach might still be whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは不愉快そうに口を歪めた。 {/n}「先見司たちだ。彼らの力でどうにかできたはずだった。長くクルダラを繁栄に導いた彼らだったが、おかげで自分たちの周囲で何が起きているのかが見えなくなっていた。もし彼らが古の習わしの通り、予言に従わずにいれば、代わりに航路を変えていれば…クルダラは今も無傷だったかもしれない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特的嘴角不悦地扭曲着。{/n}“那些先知，这件事情完全在他们的能力范围之内。他们让克鲁达拉赫繁荣多年，却对周遭发生的事情视而不见。如果他们没有遵循古老的传统那样，凡事一味遵循预言，如果他们当初改变了航线……克鲁达拉赫可能依然存在。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in displeasure.{/n} "The Farseers. It was not beyond their power. They led Crudarach to prosperity for years, only to become too blind to what was going on around them. Had they not followed the prophecy as the old customs required, had they changed course instead... Crudarach might still be whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特的嘴角不悦地扭曲着。{/n}“那些先知，这件事情完全在他们得能力范围之内。他们让克鲁达拉赫繁荣多年，却对周遭发生的事情视而不见。如果他们没有遵循古老的传统那样，凡是一味遵循预言，如果他们当初改变了航线……克鲁达拉赫可能依然存在。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La bouche d'Yrliet se tord en une grimace de mécontentement.{/n} « Les Grands Prophètes. Eux détiennent un tel pouvoir. Ils ont passé des années à conduire Crudarach à la prospérité, tout cela pour devenir aveugle à ce qui se passait autour d'eux. S'ils n'avaient pas suivi la prophétie comme l'exigeaient les vieilles traditions, s'ils avaient plutôt changé de trajectoire... Crudarach serait peut-être encore. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in displeasure.{/n} "The Farseers. It was not beyond their power. They led Crudarach to prosperity for years, only to become too blind to what was going on around them. Had they not followed the prophecy as the old customs required, had they changed course instead... Crudarach might still be whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}La bouche d'Yrliet se tord en une grimace de mécontentement.{/n} « Les Grands Prophètes. Eux détiennent un tel pouvoir. Ils ont passé des années à conduire Crudarach à la prospérité, tout cela pour devenir aveugle à ce qui se passait autour d'eux. S'ils n'avaient pas suivi la prophétie comme l'exigeaient les vieilles traditions, s'ils avaient plutôt changé de trajectoire... Crudarach serait peut-être encore. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet verzieht missbilligend den Mund.{/n} "Die Runenpropheten. Es stand in ihrer Macht, etwas zu ändern. Sie sorgten dafür, dass Crudarach jahrelang gedeihen konnte. Dann wurden sie aber zu blind dafür, was um sie herum passierte. Wären sie nicht der Prophezeiung gefolgt, wie es die alte Tradition verlangte, und hätten stattdessen den Kurs geändert ... Dann könnte Crudarach noch existieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in displeasure.{/n} "The Farseers. It was not beyond their power. They led Crudarach to prosperity for years, only to become too blind to what was going on around them. Had they not followed the prophecy as the old customs required, had they changed course instead... Crudarach might still be whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet verzieht missbilligend den Mund.{/n} "Die Runenpropheten. Es stand in ihrer Macht, etwas zu ändern. Sie sorgten dafür, dass Crudarach jahrelang gedeihen konnte. Dann wurden sie aber zu blind dafür, was um sie herum passierte. Wären sie nicht der Prophezeiung gefolgt, wie es die alte Tradition verlangte, und hätten stattdessen den Kurs geändert ... Dann könnte Crudarach noch exisitieren."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in dudakları, hoşnutsuzlukla büzülüyor.{/n} "Ötesezenler... Onlar alt edebilirdi ama. Yıllarca Crudarach'ı refaha taşıdılar. Ta ki etraflarında olan biteni göremeyecek hâle gelene kadar... Eski geleneklerimizin buyurduğu üzere kehanetin peşine düşmeyip rotayı değiştirselerdi... Crudarach belki hâlâ tek parça olurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in displeasure.{/n} "The Farseers. It was not beyond their power. They led Crudarach to prosperity for years, only to become too blind to what was going on around them. Had they not followed the prophecy as the old customs required, had they changed course instead... Crudarach might still be whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in dudakları, hoşnutsuzlukla büzülüyor.{/n} "Ötesezenler... Onların yapabileceklerinin ötesinde değildi. Yıllar boyunca Crudarach'ı refaha taşıdılar. Ta ki etraflarında olan biteni göremeyecek hâle gelene kadar... Eski geleneklerimizin buyurduğu üzere kehanetin peşine düşmeselerdi, onun yerine rotayı değiştirselerdi... Crudarach belki hâlâ tek parça olurdu."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
